abstract: Taxonomy inference for tabular data is a critical task of schema inference, aiming at discovering entity types (ie, concepts) of the tables and building their hierarchy. It can play an important role in data management, data exploration, ontology learning, and …

abstract: The adaptation of Large Language Models (LLMs) to specialized domains such as biomedicine holds significant promise for advancing Natural Language Processing (NLP) applications in healthcare and medical research. In this survey, we investigate …
